message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI 

The paper discusses recommender systems, which are typically studied in the machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR) communities. The focus on learning from implicit feedback data suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research, which often deals with learning from unstructured or noisy data. The use of complex models and optimization techniques suggests a connection to data science (cs.DS) research. Finally, the application of these techniques to recommender systems suggests a connection to social and information networks (cs.SI) research.
